alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Logan; Loup; Rock; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:09PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rock, western Loup, southeastern Brown, northeastern Logan, northwestern Custer, Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Elsmere to near Dunning to 11 miles southwest of Halsey. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewster, Anselmo, Dunning, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Linscott, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Walworth, Almeria, Hawley Flats and Gates. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 235 and 265. Highway 92 between mile markers 260 and 266. Highway 83 near mile marker 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and north central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Custer; Logan; Loup; Rock; Thomas
